articles.title: 'Inundated with American travelers': End of testing rule opens summer travel floodgates - CNN
articles.description: Just as summer heats up, the US is lifting its long-standing requirement for all travelers entering the country to present a negative Covid-19 test.
articles.content:
(CNN) Just as summer heats up, the US is lifting its long-standing requirement for all travelers entering the country to present a negative Covid-19 test.

articles.title: Canada commits $27M on easing migration pressures at Summit of the Americas - CBC News
articles.description: Leaders from across the Americas, including Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, signed on Friday to what U.S. President Joe Biden called a "historic commitment" to ease the pressure of northward migration.
